title: Chickpea salad in a jar
ingredients: ['For the salad', '30g baby spinach leaves', '135g grated beetroot', '240g chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '110g grated carrots', 'For the salad dressing', '60ml extra-virgin olive oil', '60ml apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons honey', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
